Package manager

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
manager.GameManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommandLineGameManager, GraphicalGameManager
public abstract class GameManager extends Object
The GameManager class is an abstract class that defines the basic functionality of a game manager. The GameManager is implemented as a Singleton using the getInstance() method.

      public void setupPlayerTeam(String teamName, int numWeeks, ArrayList<Champion> champions, float difficulty)
      Sets up the playerTeam, the difficulty and the number of weeks, should be called by the setup
      Parameters:
      teamName - The team name
      numWeeks - The number of weeks in the season
      champions - List of champions in the player team
      difficulty - The difficulty of the game
